title: The Music Of Us - A free e-novella
description: Mai's final high school exam should be a cause for celebration but sitting it means she's missed the opportunity to audition for the biggest gig of her life – playing support for Gray, the biggest singer/songwriter in the country. Family obligations and her own sense of responsibility means she didn't really have a choice but she hates that she's let down her whole band.When her best friend and bandmate Lexie gives her a way to make amends, she's in. Even though the plan includes sneaking in to Gray's penthouse apartment and trying to convince him to give them another chance. When she finds herself in the wrong room with a half–naked boy, she's not sure anything she can say will convince him she's not some crazy stalker fan. But, for Mai, when words fail, sometimes music speaks…
author: Beck Nicholas
